pullRequest.title: [squeezebox] Clarify the process of adding/discovering the server

commit.message: Clarify the process of adding/discovering the server

nodes.bodyText:
Please put each sentence on its own line.

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            Once it is added as a Thing the Squeeze Server bridge will discover Squeeze Players automatically. If your Squeeze Server is not discovered automatically, you can add it manually by creating a .thing file containing something like this (more example [below](https://www.openhab.org/addons/bindings/squeezebox/#thing-configuration)):
          
          
            
            Once it is added as a Thing the Squeeze Server bridge will discover Squeeze Players automatically.
          
          
            
            If your Squeeze Server is not discovered automatically, you can add it manually by creating a .thing file containing something like this (more example [below](https://www.openhab.org/addons/bindings/squeezebox/#thing-configuration)):
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -25,7 +25,10 @@ Squeeze players may be official Logitech products or other players like [Squeeze
 ## Discovery
 
 A Squeeze Server is discovered through UPnP in the local network.
-Once it is added as a Thing the Squeeze Server bridge will discover Squeeze Players automatically.
+Once it is added as a Thing the Squeeze Server bridge will discover Squeeze Players automatically. If your Squeeze Server is not discovered automatically, you can add it manually by creating a .thing file containing something like this (more example [below](https://www.openhab.org/addons/bindings/squeezebox/#thing-configuration)):

nodes.bodyText:
I find this change a little confusing.


This section is talking about Discovery, so it seems out of place to be giving examples of how to create the thing using a .things file (not a .thing file). I'd suggest putting the .things file example further down in the document where the Items file example is given.


Also, even if the case where server thing is not discovered automatically, it still can be created through the Admin UI (as all other things can be created). However, since this is not mentioned, it leaves the user with the idea that if it's not discovered automatically, then they need to create it using a .things file. It just feels like a discussion of how to create things manually using any method (UI or .things file) is out of place in the section on Discovery.

+Once it is added as a Thing the Squeeze Server bridge will discover Squeeze Players automatically. If your Squeeze Server is not discovered automatically, you can add it manually by creating a .thing file containing something like this (more example [below](https://www.openhab.org/addons/bindings/squeezebox/#thing-configuration)):
